mapper.select: SELECT ba.`name` AS `name`, ba.id AS id, ba.place AS place, CASE WHEN ba.place = 1 THEN '首页顶部' ELSE '首页顶部' END as placeName, ba.type AS type, CASE WHEN ba.type = 1 THEN '一张图片' ELSE '一张图片' END as typeName, date_format(ba.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS startTime, date_format(ba.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS endTime, date_format(ba.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS startTime1, date_format(ba.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS endTime1, ba.is_enable AS isEnable, ba.add_time AS addTime, ba.update_time AS updateTime, ba.user_id AS userId, ba.url AS url FROM t_banner AS ba where id = #{value}
